description: A week to celebrate the beauty of Somerset, from highland cows to blue skies over Minehead beach.
title: Somerset in Pictures: Blue skies, cows and Crufts
title_page: Somerset in Pictures: Blue skies, cows and Crufts - BBC News
maintext:
It was a week to celebrate the beauty of Somerset, from tender moments with highland cows at sunrise to blue skies over Minehead beach.
Meanwhile, cricketer Tom Lammonby and rugby player Sam Maunder launched their new 9|15 caf√©, adding to the county's growing list of exciting ventures.
And a photographer took his camera high up on the Mendips to capture a special celestial sight.
